readme:
# Atom Redux
A UI Overhaul Package, Based on merging and updating of older packages with new features.

Completed Features :

-   Update original projects for Atom v1.13.0 Shadow DOM changes

Planned Features :

-   Add options for colour and other customisations
-   Selective enabling of features
-   Merge project features for a more coherent experience (E.g. Neon Selection Redux and Outline Selection Redux)
-   Plugins (E.g. Git based features, Code based features etc.)

# Included
## Neon Cursor Redux & Neon Selection Redux

[Neon Cursor Original Project](https://github.com/muchweb/atom-neon-cursor)

[Neon Selection Original Project](https://github.com/muchweb/atom-neon-selection)

Cursor Preview

![Cursor](http://imgur.com/PfjL4Wp.gif)

Selection Preview

![Selection](http://i.imgur.com/URKq65t.png)

## Fancy Brackets Matcher Redux

[Original Project](https://github.com/Evpok/fancy-bracket-matcher)

Bracket Matcher Preview

![Bracket Matcher](http://cl.ly/aqmy/Screen%20Recording%202015-05-04%20at%2010.47%20PM.gif)

# Coming Soon
## Outline Selection Redux

[Original Project](https://github.com/mupchrch/outline-selection)

Selection Preview

![Outline Selection](https://github.com/mupchrch/outline-selection/raw/master/demo.gif)
